entry.title: New release for Kontoj: First version !
New release for Kontoj: version 1.1
entry.content:
What's new in 1.1 ?

‚ú® New: - Kontoj Companion Userscript to let you autofill data on your services ! (More information in the README) - Ability to switch between body and html-body before generating the mail - Add a settings dialog for future settings - Add a welcome screen with some information including an undraw.co illustration ! - Add a donation link inside about dialog - Alert the user if no JSON file selected - Alert the user if closing tab/browser to avoid data loss

üêõ Fixes: - Border-radius missing on accordion body - Fix firstname/lastname fields swapped

entry.title: New release for Kontoj: version 1.1.1
entry.content:
What's new in 1.1.1 ?

‚ú® New: - Add an indicator (plus sign) next to the create account icon if the service have autofill data - Check if jQuery is available on the service before injecting it (this part will be improved later) - New example in services.example.json for autofill (Gitlab registration) - Add host information on the manifest.json file (for later displaying it)

üêõ Fixes: - Fix documentation URL - Add a space between example and file url on welcome screen

entry.title: New release for Kontoj: version 1.5
entry.content:
What's new in 1.5 ?

‚ú® New: - Major design update: - The JSON file is now loaded once you browse for your file, no need to click on Load button anymore ! - If you attempt to load another JSON, it will warn you for data loss - Buttons fill mail & generate password are now combined into one fill button: ü™Ñ - A small badge number indicate how many services you have selected on the fill button ü™Ñ - Ability to switch between light/dark mode, default to OS/web browser settings - Bootstrap Icons are now used instead of Emojis for better consistency across OS/web browsers - Buttons now display labels on it by default (it can be changed to just icons in settings) - Buttons were rearranged: buttons that open windows on the top bar, buttons that do actions on the lower bar - About dialog now include a link to releases notes, information of the host used (eg. GitHub), galaksio logo, build number removed - Password fields are now in locked state when generation mail body - Login button was removed, you can now click on the service name/service logo to go to the service login page - Some configuration from JSON file can now be overrided: subjectMail, bodyMailStart, bodyMailEnd, passwordLength, passwordChars - Allow usage of firstname lastname variables in bodyMailEnd - Services & Groups can be disabled in the JSON file (they will not appear if you load the file) - Groups can be collapsed by default if set in the JSON file - Services can have autofill disabled on mail/password fields when using the fill button ü™Ñ (eg. if you want to use a different mail address, enter a password manually...), a small cross icon indicate this on the field - README is translated in french ! Bonjour Baguette ! ü•ñ

üêõ Fixes: - Fix GitHub deploy breaking on each commit on galaksiotech because of missing CNAME - Fix Kontoj logo to put transparency instead of fixed color background

entry.title: New release for Kontoj: version 2.0
entry.content:
What's new in 2.0 ?

‚ú® New: - Services can now have a Status field to display a link leading to the Service Status (either in a new tab or an iframe) - Kontoj Companion now loads in custom Kontoj instances using <meta name="application-name" content="Kontoj"> - Kontoj Companion now deletes credentials after 5mn by default (configurable to : -1 immediately, 0 never, or X minutes) - Kontoj now displays information about Kontoj Companion: if it's installed, if it's up to date - Add support for Pro Features, more details soon - Support list encryption in Pro - Ability to autoload a services list json file if configured in a custom instance - Hide passwords by default in main list using a font instead of <input type="password"/> to avoid web browser/password software issues - An alert will be display if you are running a new version of Kontoj to let you know about it

üîÅ Changed: - ‚ö†Ô∏è Starting from 2.0 autofill now use CSS selectors instead of jQuery (to reduce errors, improve performance) - Separate manifest.json and config.json, the latest is optional - Update README to reflect changes and bootstrap icons - Videos are included and replace gif in README - Reduce firstname/lastname fields to fit in Chrome - In Kontoj Companion, passwords are now stored in base64 instead of plain text - Revamp the user interface for services fields/buttons with Bootstrap components - Revamp the settings dialog with Bootstrap switches - "Password Type": "google-account" have been replaced by "Password Type": "third-party" and you can specify the third party with : "Third Party": "Google"

üêõ Fixes: - Mail generation templating issues fixed (encoding and bodyMailEnd) - Konto Companion checks if json is loaded before doing anything to remove an error - The welcome screen is now hided properly to avoid empty space and scrollbar if not needed

üõ† For Devs: - Add a way to prefill firstname, lastname, email and group on Kontoj launch for testing purposes (in config.json) - Add a deploy rule for GitHub - Custom favicon and "dev" badge if env is set to "dev" in config.json - All JS/CSS libraries are now loaded using gulp (npx gulp) and downloaded using npm
